{"step_by_step_thinking": "The mode is a statistical term that refers to the most frequently occurring number found in a set of numbers. It is not the average of the values, which is the mean (option A and C are describing the mean). It is also not the midpoint of a data set, which is the median (option B). Therefore, the mode must be the number which appears most often in a set of numbers.", "answer_choice": "D"}
